TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RequestValidationSource extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定要驗證的 HTTP 要求資料類型。

span.span: Specifies what kind of HTTP request data to validate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Util.RequestValidationSource Cookies = int32(2)

remarks.format: ## Remarks `collectionKey`參數方法設定為集合中的 cookie 名稱。The `collectionKey` parameter of the method is set to the name of the cookie in the collection. `value`參數方法設定為集合中的值。The `value` parameter of the method is set to the value in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Util.RequestValidationSource Files = int32(3)

remarks.format: ## Remarks `collectionKey`參數方法設定為集合中的上傳檔案的名稱。The `collectionKey` parameter of the method is set to the name of the uploaded file in the collection. `value`參數方法設定為上傳的檔案集合中的值。The `value` parameter of the method is set to the value of the uploaded file in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Util.RequestValidationSource Form = int32(1)

remarks.format: ## Remarks `collectionKey`參數方法設定為表單中的參數集合的名稱。The `collectionKey` parameter of the method is set to the name of the form parameter in the collection. `value`參數方法設定為集合中的表單參數的值。The `value` parameter of the method is set to the value of the form parameter in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Util.RequestValidationSource Headers = int32(7)

remarks.format: ## Remarks `collectionKey`參數方法設定為 HTTP 標頭集合中的名稱。The `collectionKey` parameter of the method is set to the name of an HTTP header in the collection. `value`參數方法設定為集合中的 HTTP 標頭的值。The `value` parameter of the method is set to the value of the HTTP header in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Util.RequestValidationSource Path = int32(5)

remarks.format: ## Remarks `collectionKey`參數方法設定為`null`(`Path`不是值的集合)。The `collectionKey` parameter of the method is set to `null` (`Path` is not a collection of values). `value`參數方法設定為 [路徑] 欄位的值。The `value` parameter of the method is set to the value of the Path field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Util.RequestValidationSource PathInfo = int32(6)

summary.span: HTTP 字串，此字串為 URL 路徑的延伸部分。

span.span: An HTTP string, which is an extension to a URL path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `collectionKey`參數方法設定為`null`(`PathInfo`不是值的集合)。The `collectionKey` parameter of the method is set to `null` (`PathInfo` is not a collection of values). `value`參數方法設定為 PathInfo 欄位的值。The `value` parameter of the method is set to the value of the PathInfo field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Util.RequestValidationSource QueryString = int32(0)

remarks.format: ## Remarks `collectionKey`參數方法設定為集合中的查詢字串參數的名稱。The `collectionKey` parameter of the method is set to the name of the query string parameter in the collection. `value`參數方法設定為集合中的查詢字串參數的值。The `value` parameter of the method is set to the value of the query-string parameter in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Util.RequestValidationSource RawUrl = int32(4)

span.span: (The part of a URL after the domain.)

remarks.format: ## Remarks `collectionKey`參數方法設定為`null`。The `collectionKey` parameter of the method is set to `null`. (`RawUrl`不是集合的值。)(`RawUrl` is not a collection of values.) `value`參數方法設定為 RawUrl 欄位的值。The `value` parameter of the method is set to the value of the RawUrl field.
